record.dc:title: 11MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 38MG31, Meigs County, Tennessee. 38MG31 - Village. Feature 11, Dwelling house floor pattern with central hearth. Square 3L17. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: Village site to the west of earthwork 37MG31. Square structure with central fire basin. Fire basin square with rounded corners and raised rim - lined with puddled clay baked hard. No clay floor was apparent - no wattle in evidence. Floor lay on undisturbed basic clay. Intrusive pit later than structure cuts east side of fire basin. Bottom of fire basin clayed and baked hard.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution.
